metadata.title: CVE-2020-6407 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Out of bounds memory access in streams in Google Chrome prior to80.0.3987.122 allowed a remote attacker to potentially exploit heapcorruption via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
